title: X
gallery_page_teaser: X's spiritual portrait shows she is ______________.  Click on the image to learn more!
explain_dom: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, iNtuition: idealism and hope for the future; openness to new ideas; very slight/moderate/strong preference for ideas over facts; see the world through an idealistic lens.

The Blue in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of ideas than of facts; need for intellectual stimulation.

The Green in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more logical/rational/impersonal/objective over the emotional/irrational/personal/subjective.

The Green in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrational/personal/subjective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more logical/rational/impersonal/objective rather than emotional/irrational/personal/subjective.

The Red in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Feeling: passion; amiability; friendliness; compassion; warmth; very slight/moderate/strong preference for emotion/empathy/subjectivity over logic/reason/objectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more emotional/irrational/personal/subjective over the logical/rational/impersonal/objective.

The Red in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making emotional/personal/objective rather than logical/rational/impersonal/objective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more emotional/irrational/personal/subjective rather than logical/rational/impersonal/objective.

The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Sensing: pragmatism; pragmatic; practical; realism; realistic; outlook; openness to new experiences; very slight/moderate/strong preference for facts over ideas.

The Yellow in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of facts rather than of ideas; need for sensual stimulation.
explain_dom_constant: In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
explain_dom_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference/tendency is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.

The Blue in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of ideas than of facts.

The Green in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, Thinking: objectivity; rationality; cool-headedness; very slight/moderate/strong preference for logic/reason/objectivity over emotion/empathy/subjectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more logical/rational/impersonal/objective over the emotional/irrational/personal/subjective.

The Red in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making emotional/irrational/personal/subjective rather than logical/rational/objective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more emotional/irrational/personal/subjective rather than logical/rational/impersonal/objective.

The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, Sensing: pragmatism; pragmatic; practical; realism; realistic; outlook; openness to new experiences; very slight/moderate/strong preference for facts over ideas.

The Yellow in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of facts rather than of ideas; need for sensual stimulation.
